Package com.opentok

Interface Summary
Publisher.Listener Monitors state changes in a Publisher object.
Session.Listener Monitors state changes of a Session instance.
Subscriber.Listener Monitors state changes of a Subscriber instance.
 

Class Summary
Connection  
Publisher A publisher captures an audio-video stream from the device's microphone and camera.
Session The first step in using the OpenTok Android SDK is to initialize a Session instance is with a valid API key, session ID, and token.
Stream Used to describe a stream bound to an OpenTok session.
Subscriber Consumes audio and video of a publisher in the OpenTok session.
 

Exception Summary
Exceptions Exceptions thrown by the OpenTok Java SDK.
